index int

An int representing an absolute bar index value

Events

ChangeCompleted

Raises when the series of consequent changes ends. Usually, it is batch data adding to series For sole events, each event is embraced with Begin-End pair Pay attention that this event is not thread-safe (while its firing there maybe other changes)

event Action<IBarSeries> ChangeCompleted

Event Type

Action<IBarSeries>
